name: willcore.mysql
description: ```javascript //index.server.js module.exports = (view, willCore, assignables) => {     //Create DB     //Create DB     willCore.myDB = [assignables.mysql,"connection string", "username","password"];     //Create table     willCore.myDB.owners = assignables.dbTable;     willCore.myDB.owners.name = assignables.dbString;     willCore.myDB.owners.auditDate = assignables.dbDate;     //default value     willCore.myDB.dogs.auditDate = () => new Date();     //Create table     willCore.myDB.dogs = assignables.dbTable;;     willCore.myDB.dogs.name = assignables.dbString;     willCore.myDB.dogs.age = assignables.dbInt;     //Foreign key (one)     willCore.myDB.dogs.owner = willCore.myDB.owners;     //Foreign key (many)     willCore.myDB.dogs["*owners"] = willCore.myDB.owners;     //Updates the db     await willCore.myDB();
author: Philip Schoeman
